privacyModalText.title: Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
privacyModalText.description:
Before continuing, you need to accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.



Please take a moment to read them carefully.
privacyModalText.termsAndPrivacy: I accept the <terms>Terms and Conditions</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.dataPrivacyNotice: Privacy notice and personal data processing

content.paragraph1: You have already authorized the processing of your personal data to the Controller of the service you use. As part of this process, and in compliance with current regulations, we inform you that ADAMO S.A.S. acts as a technology provider and Data Processor, performing technical operations on behalf of the Controller.
content.paragraph2: ADAMO will not use your data for its own purposes and will process it exclusively according to the instructions received and in accordance with strict security and confidentiality standards.
content.paragraph3: For more information about how we protect your data, please consult our Data Processing Policy here:
content.paragraph4: If you have any additional concerns, you can write to us at: contact@adamoservices.co

validation.invalid_string: Must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.

ResetPage.title: Reset Password
ResetPage.toast: Your password has been updated successfully. Sign in to your account.

emailStep.title: Reset Password
emailStep.description: Enter your email address where we will send a code to reset your password:

otpStep.description: Enter the code we have sent to your email at:
otpStep.resendBlockedTimer: Too many requests. Try again in {timer}

validation.exactLength: The verification code must be exactly 6 digits.
validation.alphanumericOnly: The verification code must contain only letters and numbers.
validation.noSpaces: The verification code cannot contain spaces.

passwordStep.title: Reset Password
passwordStep.passwordHelperText: At least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, a number, and a special character (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]|;:,.<>?).

validation.invalid_string: Must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]|;:,.<>?).
validation.custom: The passwords entered do not match, please verify.

invalid.email: The email address entered is not valid.
invalid.emailNotFound: The email address is not registered in our system.
invalid.accountBlocked: This account has been blocked. Please contact support.
invalid.code: The verification code entered is not valid.
invalid.otpExpired: The verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
invalid.maxOtpAttempts: You have exceeded the maximum number of verification code attempts.
invalid.password: The password entered is not valid.
invalid.weakPassword: The password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
invalid.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please start the process again.
invalid.maxAttempts: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts for this Email Address.
invalid.temporaryBlock: Too many failed attempts. Please try again in 15 minutes.

invalid.genericError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

welcome.description: Everything you need is here, in a platform designed to simplify your document management.

documents.description: Includes documents in progress, rejected by invitees, and completed.

AppDocuments.title: Documents
AppDocuments.description: Simplify, automate, and optimize every aspect of your documents in one place.

NewDocument.title: New Document
NewDocument.description: Register a new document. Drag your file here or:
NewDocument.fileSizeNote: Max size: 50 MB in .pdf or .doc format
NewDocument.unsupporedFile: Unsupported file type. Please upload a PDF, Word, PowerPoint, JPG, or PNG.
NewDocument.validFile: Please select a valid file first.
NewDocument.conversionFailed: Conversion failed or result is missing the file URL
NewDocument.conversionUnknown: Conversion failed: An unknown error occurred.

RestoreModal.title: Restore selected documents
RestoreModal.description: Restoring the selected documents will move them back to the documents page, allowing the involved users to access them again.

DocumentStatus.hasNotSeen: Has not yet seen the document
DocumentStatus.heading: Documents
DocumentStatus.deleteDescriptionSingle: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.
DocumentStatus.deleteDescriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete these {count} documents? This action cannot be undone.
DocumentStatus.registerBlockchainSuccess: The document has been successfully registered on the blockchain.
DocumentStatus.registerBlockchainError: Error registering the document on the blockchain.
DocumentStatus.noSignedVersion: There is no signed version of the document.
DocumentStatus.noDocumentUrl: There is no document URL available.
DocumentStatus.registerBlockchainDescription: Registering your document on the blockchain ensures its authenticity and integrity, providing a secure and immutable record of its existence.

SignDocumentModal.title: Sign document

tabWrite.title: Write signature
tabWrite.subtitle: Select a font and write your signature:

tabUpload.title: Upload signature
tabUpload.subtitle: Drag a file or select from the computer:
tabUpload.uploadRequirements: Max size 50 MB in .jpg or .png format

EditDocNameModal.description: Enter a name for the document:

EditDocModal.description: Edit the personal information and requested verifications:
EditDocModal.requireVerificationLabel: Request verification to sign the document
EditDocModal.planDescription: Interested in Robust Authentication? Upgrade your plan and unlock new possibilities.

selfie.title: Selfie
selfie.description: The participant captures a selfie as visual proof. This will not be validated; it will only be stored as backup within the signature record.

document.title: Identity Document Photo
document.description: The participant takes a photo of their identity document. This will not be validated; it will only be stored as backup within the signature record.

identity.title: Identity Validation
identity.description: Official documents (passport, ID card, or driver's license) and scanning technologies are used to confirm authenticity.

facial.title: Facial Verification
facial.description: After validating the identity, the participant records a real-time video. Our system compares both images to ensure a match.

phone.title: Phone Verification
phone.description: We will send a verification code via SMS to the registered phone number, which will serve as a backup for the signature.

email.title: Email Verification
email.description: We will send a verification code to the registered email address, which will serve as a backup for the signature.

step4.title: Congratulations! The document has been successfully sent.
step4.description: Remember that you can also copy the signing link and share it with each participant through your preferred communication channel.

VerificationsPage.title: Verifications
VerificationsPage.description: Enter the document‚Äôs hash to verify its signature and ensure the document‚Äôs integrity.
VerificationsPage.checkErrorNote: The entered signature is not valid or is not registered on the blockchain.
VerificationsPage.checkSuccessNote: The entered signature is valid. Below you can review its information.

ProfilePage.title: My Profile
ProfilePage.success: Your profile information has been successfully updated.
ProfilePage.error: An error occurred while loading your profile information.

security.title: Security
security.description: Update your password and/or enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for enhanced security.

plans.title: Plans & Billing
plans.description: Manage your billing, access your current plan, and discover more available plans.

ProfileModal.title: Update Personal Information
ProfileModal.modalText: If you need to change your email address, please contact <link>Customer Service.</link>
ProfileModal.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload a valid image.

PasswordModal.title: Change Password
PasswordModal.description: To continue, please enter your current password:
PasswordModal.inputNewPasswordHelperText: Must be at least 8 characters long, include one uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
PasswordModal.toast: Your password has been successfully updated.
PasswordModal.error: Error changing password. Please verify that the current password is correct and that the new passwords match.

Activate2FAModal.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
Activate2FAModal.description: To get started, download an authentication app on your mobile device, for example, <link>Google Authenticator.</link>
Activate2FAModal.descriptionQr: Open the app and scan the following QR, or manually enter the code below:
Activate2FAModal.alert: Keep this code in a safe place. If you lose your phone, it will help you restore your Authenticator. Otherwise, the process may take at least 7 days.
Activate2FAModal.descriptionOTP: Enter the 6-digit code provided by the authentication app.
Activate2FAModal.descriptionSuccess: You have successfully enabled Two-Factor Authentication to protect your account.
Activate2FAModal.errorGeneratingQR: Error generating QR code. Please try again.

Deactivate2FAModal.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
Deactivate2FAModal.description: If you disable Two-Factor Authentication, your account security will be weakened, exposing it to unauthorized logins.
Deactivate2FAModal.descriptionOTP: Enter the 6-digit code provided by the authentication app.
Deactivate2FAModal.descriptionSuccess: Two-Factor Authentication has been disabled. Your account's security is now weaker and may be exposed to unauthorized access.
Deactivate2FAModal.alert: If you wish, you can enable it again at any time from your user profile.
Deactivate2FAModal.errorDeactivating2FA: Error disabling Two-Factor Authentication. Please verify that the verification code is correct.
